ModMetaData.name: Quick Paint Terrain Brush Dev Tool
ModMetaData.author: ProgrammerLily
ModMetaData.description:
Adds five developer brush tools to the Debug Menu that apply terrain in square areas of fixed size (4×4, 8×8, 16×16, 32×32, 64×64).
This mod extends the existing terrain rectangle tool with preset square brushes centered on the clicked tile. Perfect for rapid terrain prototyping and map design with paint-while-dragging functionality.
Features: • Five brush sizes: 4x4, 8x8, 16x16, 32x32, 64x64 • Paint-while-dragging: Hold and drag to paint continuously • Uses existing terrain selection UI for each brush size • Visual brush preview under mouse cursor • Integrated into Debug Menu under "Map" category
Usage: 1. Open the Debug Menu (Development mode required) 2. search for "Brush Tool" in the Actions/tools 3. Select desired brush size (e.g., "Terrain brush (16x16)") 4. Choose terrain type from the submenu 5. Click and drag on map to paint terrain with the brush
Each brush size opens a submenu with all available terrain types. Select the terrain you want to paint with and the brush tool will activate. You can click once to paint a single area, or click and drag to paint continuously as you move the mouse.
